text: Bernard Brochand (5 June 1938 - 25 February 2025) was a French politician.M. Bernard Brochand He graduated from HEC Paris.Bernard Brochand He was a member of the National Assembly of France from 2001 to 2002. He was member of The Republicans.M. Bernard Brochand Brochand died on 25 February 2025 in Cannes, France at the age of 86. == References == Category:1938 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Alumni of HEC Paris Category:French mayors Category:People from Cannes Category:Politicians from Nice
title: Bernard Brochand
